Goofy

蔡臻平 // Tsai chen ping // Goofy

About Myself

Hi, I am a college student from Taiwan. Keen to learn a variety of knowledge about the computer programming. So I have come across many programming languages and also have some practical experience. I may not have a deep foundation, but I love to try new things!
